title: Ticket #636: condor_status XYZ's query should include XYZ, not just XYZ.fqdn
description:
If a node35 is reporting itself to the collector as node35 and not node35.example.com, and condor_status node35 is run from a machine that can resolve node35 to node35.example.com, then the lookup will fail. 

env _CONDOR_TOOL_DEBUG=D_ALL condor_status -debug node35 2>&1 | grep Requirements
Requirements = (((TARGET.Name == "node35.example.com") || (TARGET.Machine == "node35.example.com")))

Obviously because the query only looks for the FQDN. Adding '|| Name == "node35" || Machine = "node35"' to the query would address the issue.

A workaround is of course to use -constraint and specify 'Name == "node35"' explicitly.
